body:
Is there a consensus on using pre-standard cxxstd values (e.g., 'c++2a') in spack packages?

~~The patch for Boost.Outcome is broken on the boost patch server. I've sent an email to the author, and am awaiting a response. The patch file included in this PR is correct.~~ The author updated the patch on boost.org/patches, and is now the same as the one provided here.
title: Boost: Add version 1.73.0
